âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Unhypes/neutralizes web page headers â€¢ Configurable CSS selectors for content processing â€¢ Integration with multiple LLM providers (Ollama, OpenRouter, Mistral AI) â€¢ LLM connection status indicator â€¢ Manual installation option via zip archive
ðŸ“– Summary: The unhype browser extension neutralizes or 'unhypes' clickbait-style headers on web pages. It allows users to configure which elements on a page are processed using CSS selectors and connects to an LLM to rewrite the selected text in a more neutral tone. The extension supports multiple LLM providers, including Ollama, OpenRouter, and Mistral AI.
